title: China criticizes U.S. for WHO pullout, accusing it of sidestepping international law
description: China criticized the United States for withdrawing from the WHO, saying countries should not place domestic politics ahead of international law.
content: China criticized the United States for withdrawing from the WHO, saying countries should not place domestic politics ahead of international law.
